title: cmd/godoc: all commands are named "main"
body:
Go to http://tip.golang.org/cmd/go/ and http://tip.golang.org/cmd/yacc/ and look at the
title and the command name. It's "main" for every command.

This is pretty annoying when you have many different browser tabs with command
documentation open and you can't figure out which is which at a glance.
